title: Metatrader iOS | iPhone & iPad | IC Markets
meta: Download MetaTrader for your iPhone device, get access to our market leading spreads directly from your iPhone or iPad. Click to trade!
mt_ios_page_2: Stay connected to the market at all times with our market leading MetaTrader True ECN account on your iPhone or iPad.
mt_ios_page_13: We offer both MetaTrader 4 and MetaTrader 5 as an application on the iPhone and iPad. These applications give traders easy access to their accounts wherever they are.
mt_ios_page_14: Our mobile MetaTrader application uses many of the advanced features of the iPhone and iPad, such as the landscape-to-portrait view changer (a simple rotation of the device). The mobile MetaTrader application also offers one click trading, the ability to customise your layouts, and advanced charts and analysis. Use our mobile MetaTrader applications to experience unlimited flexibility without compromising execution speed or quality.
mt_ios_page_17: iPhone iOS 7.0 or later. Compatible with iPhone, iPad and iPod touch.
mt_ios_page_18: Trade Forex on the go with your iPhone or iPad!
mt_ios_page_19_2: Full set of trade orders, including pending orders
mt_ios_page_19_4: Support of all types of execution modes
mt_ios_page_19_6: Real-time interactive charts with zoom and scroll
mt_ios_page_19_7: 30+ of the most popular technical indicators
mt_ios_page_19_8: Multiple timeframes to analyze price action and patterns
mt_ios_page_19_9: 3 chart types: Bars, Japanese Candlesticks, Line
mt_ios_page_20_2: Trade levels and volumes on the chart
mt_ios_page_20_4: Free and easily downloadable directly from the Apple App Store
